title: (x) "Stredio" serif stencil font with chunky 'e' - similar to Caslon Stencil {Stephen}
content:
Font id anyone?  
it might be a custom created title font,  
but any suggestions of similar fonts appreciated...

text from from Street & Studio photo book for Tate Modern, designed by Buro Intl London.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150101203912im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stencil-font_6166.jpg)
author: Jennys

comments.content:
You could also achieve a similar effect by stencilizing [ITC Caslon No. 224](http://web.archive.org/web/20150101203912/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/itc/itc_caslon_no_224_std_by_adobe_complete_vp/) or [Caslon Graphique](http://web.archive.org/web/20150101203912/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/caslon_graphique_ot_std/).

Here are more [serif stencil fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150101203912/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontcase/genres/stencil_serif/).
